children.name: Moon Jelly Sanctuary

attributes.description: a sanctuary for injured moon jellyfish, with a small medical center and a large aquarium. Run by a compassionate healer who strives to protect the delicate creatures of the bay.

Talitha is a retired sailor who now spends her days fishing in the bay. She has a special connection with the moon jellyfish, and often visits the sanctuary to offer them small tokens of appreciation. Talitha can be a bit grumpy at times, but her heart is always in the right place.

Gaius is a wealthy merchant from a distant land who has come to Veilvale to seek adventure. He is fascinated by the strange creatures that inhabit the maze, and often hires local guides to take him on expeditions. Despite his wealth, Gaius is prone to bouts of recklessness and often puts himself and others in danger.

Aurelia is a gentle soul who has dedicated her life to caring for animals. She runs a small animal clinic in Veilvale and often volunteers at the Moon Jelly Sanctuary. Aurelia is known for her kindness and generosity, but she can also be quite hesitant and indecisive.

ownerOccupants.name: Nahla Zouri
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask

attributes.description: Nahla is a kind-hearted healer who has dedicated her life to the care of injured moon jellyfish in the sanctuary. She wears a white mask adorned with small shells and pearls that she has collected from the ocean. Her background is adorned with tales of her childhood by the ocean, where she was raised by her grandmother who taught her the art of healing. Nahla is very empathetic but can be too overprotective towards the jellyfish at times.

children.name: The person is wearing a white mask adorned with small shells and pearls, which covers their entire face except for their eyes. They have a kind and gentle expression, with wrinkles around their eyes indicating a life of laughter and joy. Their long, dark hair is tied back in a loose braid, and they are wearing a simple white smock that is stained with spots of jellyfish slime.

ownerOccupants.name: Kazi Ahan
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask

attributes.description: Kazi is a skilled aquarist who is in charge of maintaining the large aquarium in the sanctuary. He wears a blue and green mask that resembles the colors of the ocean. Kazi hails from a coastal village where he grew up with a great love for the sea. He has a quiet and analytical personality, but can be short-tempered when things do not go as planned.

children.name: Kazi Ahan, a person in charge of the Moon Jelly Sanctuary aquarium, is depicted wearing a blue and green mask that resembles the colors of the ocean. The mask has intricate patterns and details that are reminiscent of marine life. Kazi has short black hair and wears a white lab coat over a blue shirt. He looks serious and professional, with a focused and determined expression.

ownerOccupants.name: Lian Hua
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask

attributes.description: Lian is an assistant at the sanctuary who helps Nahla and Kazi in their work. She wears a mask made of woven reeds and decorated with colorful sea glass. Lian was born in Veilvale and has always been fascinated with the moon jellyfish. She has a bubbly and outgoing personality, but can sometimes be careless and forgetful.

ownerOccupants.name: Jin Wei
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask

attributes.description: Jin is a volunteer at the sanctuary who is passionate about protecting the moon jellyfish from harm. He wears a mask made of polished wood and carved with intricate designs. Jin comes from a family of fishermen and has always had a love for the sea since he was a child. His strong-willed personality has gotten him into trouble in the past, as he can be argumentative and stubborn.

children.name: The Moon Jelly Sanctuary is a small, circular building with a thatched roof made of woven seaweed. The walls are made of a translucent material that allows visitors to see the inside of the sanctuary and the moon jellyfish swimming in the aquarium. The entrance is marked by a simple wooden door with a moon jellyfish emblem carved into it. The building is surrounded by a small garden of bioluminescent flowers and plants.

Upon entering the Moon Jelly Sanctuary, visitors are greeted by a softly glowing reception area made of polished white stone. The first room contains a small medical center, equipped with various tools and potions used to heal injured jellyfish. The second and largest room features a massive aquarium, with a rainbow of bioluminescent jellyfish floating gently in its waters. A sense of peaceful serenity pervades the space, enhanced by the gentle hum of mystical music that seems to emanate from the very walls themselves.

children.name: Glowing Grotto

attributes.description: a secret club for adventurous fishermen, with a hidden entrance and a glowing dance floor made of bioluminescent algae. Run by a charismatic host who encourages new friendships and wild stories.

ownerOccupants.name: Saffron Blossom
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Saffron is a vivacious and flamboyant host who loves nothing more than throwing a wild party. Her family has been in Veilvale for generations, and she knows all the stories and secrets of the city. She wears a mask that looks like a giant sunflower, with petals that open and close depending on her mood.

ownerOccupants.name: Raziel Moonstone
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Raziel is a brooding and mysterious bartender who serves the most potent and delicious concoctions in the Glowing Grotto. He comes from a tribe of lunar alchemists who worship the moon goddess, and he's rumored to possess mystical powers. He wears a mask that looks like a silver crescent moon, with piercing blue eyes that seem to glow in the dark.

ownerOccupants.name: Azura Coral
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Azura is a bubbly and adventurous fisherman who loves to explore the underground lakes of Veilvale. She's always eager to share her latest catch or tell a tall tale, and she has a contagious laughter that can brighten anyone's mood. She wears a mask that looks like a rainbow-colored fish, with glittering scales and fins that move with the rhythm of the music.

ownerOccupants.name: Dante Shadow
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Dante is a dark and brooding figure who likes to keep to himself. He's a skilled fisherman and a fierce fighter, with a past shrouded in mystery and danger. He wears a mask that looks like a black raven, with a sharp beak and piercing eyes that seem to follow you wherever you go. Some say he's cursed, others say he's blessed, but nobody knows for sure.

ownerOccupants.name: Lila Firefly
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Lila is a free-spirited and whimsical fisherman who believes in love and magic. She's always looking for new adventures and new friends, and she has a talent for making people feel special. She wears a mask that looks like a delicate butterfly, with intricate patterns and colors that change with the light. She's a hopeless romantic, but also a fierce defender of her friends.

visitors.name: Nimueh Darkwater
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Nimueh is a mysterious woman who often keeps to herself. She wears a black velvet mask adorned with silver moons and stars. She comes to the Glowing Grotto to unwind after a long day on the water, and looks for a quiet corner to observe the festivities.

visitors.name: Saoirse Oceana
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Saoirse is a free-spirited woman with a wild streak. She wears a mask made of seashells and colorful feathers, and is often the life of the party. She comes to the Glowing Grotto to dance the night away and flirt with the other fishermen, but sometimes her teasing can go too far.

visitors.name: Finnegan Seaborn
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Finnegan is a grizzled old sailor with a rough exterior. He wears a mask made of polished driftwood, and rarely speaks to anyone. He comes to the Glowing Grotto to drown his sorrows in ale and forget about the troubles of the world, but his melancholy can sometimes bring down the mood of the party.

visitors.name: Keegan Stormchaser
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Keegan is a brash and overconfident young man with a penchant for danger. He wears a mask that looks like a shark's face, complete with razor-sharp teeth. He comes to the Glowing Grotto to show off his latest catch and impress the ladies, but sometimes his recklessness can lead to trouble.

visitors.name: Cormac Deepsea
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Cormac is a quiet and reserved man with a keen eye for detail. He wears a mask that resembles an octopus, with writhing tentacles that seem to move on their own. He comes to the Glowing Grotto to observe the unique marine life and study their behavior, but sometimes his intense focus can be off-putting to others.

children.name: The exterior of the Glowing Grotto is a small wooden hut, built on stilts above the water of the bay. The walls are adorned with glowing jellyfish and sea anemones, and the roof is covered with moss and seaweed. A small wooden sign with the image of a fish marks the entrance, which is hidden behind a curtain of seaweed.

As you enter the Glowing Grotto, you are struck by the vibrant, iridescent colors of the bioluminescent algae that illuminate the compact dance floor. The walls are made of rough-hewn stone and decorated with seaweed and shells, creating a nautical atmosphere. There are several private booths built into the walls, with plush cushions and curtains for privacy, and a small bar in the corner that serves exotic cocktails made with rare ingredients from deep sea creatures.
Aurora Nightshade
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Aurora Nightshade is a charismatic host of the Glowing Grotto who loves to party and make new friends. She comes from a long line of Veilvale's elite class and has always lived a life of luxury. She wears a mask that looks like a starry sky with a crescent moon and is known for her sultry voice and seductive personality. Aurora is 32 years old and arrives at the club at 8 pm and stays until the sun rises.

children.name: The person is wearing a mask that resembles a clear night sky with stars and a crescent moon. She has long, flowing hair that is a deep shade of purple and is styled in loose waves. Her lips are a deep shade of red, and her eyes are lined with black eyeliner. She is wearing a long, flowing dress that is also a deep shade of purple and has a low neckline.
Zephyr Windrider
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Zephyr Windrider is the talented bartender of the Glowing Grotto, famous for his exotic and potent cocktails. He is a traveler who came to Veilvale seeking adventure and found a home in the underground club. He wears a mask that looks like a feathered bird with a long beak and is known for his quick wit and charming smile. Zephyr is 27 years old and arrives at the club at 7pm and stays until 3am.

children.name: Zephyr Windrider is a tall and slender figure, standing at about 6 feet. He has long, curly hair that falls just below his shoulders, and his bright blue eyes are framed by thick lashes. He wears a colorful feathered mask with intricate beading, and his lips curve into a mischievous smile.
Phoenix Fireheart
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party

attributes.description: Phoenix Fireheart is a talented dancer who moves with grace and passion. He wears a mask that looks like a phoenix with fiery red and orange feathers and is known for his sensual moves and flirtatious nature. Phoenix is 29 years old and arrives at the club at 11pm and stays until 3am.

children.name: The person has fiery red hair that cascades down their back in wild waves. Their eyes are a penetrating green, and their skin is bronzed from the sun. They wear a mask that looks like a phoenix with feathers in shades of orange and red, giving an impression of both elegance and danger.
Raphael Cruz
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Raphael is a burly man with a bushy beard and a mask made of driftwood. He's known for his loud laugh and his insatiable appetite for food and drink. He comes to Glowing Grotto to have a good time and forget about his troubles, but he tends to get into fights when he's had too much to drink.

children.name: Mai Lee
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Mai Lee is a petite woman with a delicate mask made of porcelain. She's a skilled fisherman and a gifted musician, playing the erhu in the town orchestra. She comes to Glowing Grotto to meet new people and play music with fellow musicians.

children.name: Saoirse Oceana
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

attributes.description: Saoirse is a free-spirited woman with a wild streak. She wears a mask made of seashells and colorful feathers, and is often the life of the party. She comes to the Glowing Grotto to dance the night away and flirt with the other fishermen, but sometimes her teasing can go too far.

instructions.ownerOccupants: describe each person's mask and make them fun people who like to host a party
instructions.visitors: describe each person's mask, and what they are looking for when they come to the club to party

children.name: Starlight Wharf

attributes.description: a dock where brightly lit boats made of shimmering seashells are moored. During the day, the boats appear to be ordinary, but at night, they glow with a soft blue light that illuminates the way for the fishermen.

children.name: Jellyfish Lagoon

attributes.description: a large body of water filled with jellyfish that glow in a myriad of colors. It is said that the jellyfish have the power to reveal hidden truths to those who seek them out.

children.name: Sea Serpent's Den

attributes.description: a cavern where a mythical sea serpent is said to live. Local fishermen leave offerings of fish and flowers at the entrance to the cavern in hopes that the sea serpent will grant them a bountiful catch.

children.name: Shifting Sands

attributes.description: In this neighborhood, residents are primarily shape-shifters who keep to themselves. It is said that there is a secret clan of shifters that meets here to practice their unique abilities.

This area is known for its constantly moving sand dunes that seem to whisper to those who walk through them. The shifting sands reveal secret tunnels and caves where the shape-shifters of Veilvale have hidden their treasures and artifacts.

A seemingly magical oasis in the middle of the desert that disappears as soon as one approaches it. But those who are deemed worthy by the Trickster can find the real oasis hidden behind the illusions, where they can find refuge and water.

A collection of smooth, round stones that seem to vibrate and hum with energy. It's said that the stones move on their own and that they are linked to the moon and star energy that powers the city's technology. The shape-shifters of Veilvale come here to meditate and connect with the cosmic forces.

A mysterious gate made of a metal that looks like silver but hums with a strange energy. The gate only appears during the full moon, and it's said that those who pass through it can travel to other dimensions and planes of existence.

A narrow canyon with steep walls that was created by a meteor strike. The canyon is filled with fragments of the fallen star, which glows with a blue light. The shape-shifters of Veilvale come here to perform rituals that honor the cosmic forces and to collect star dust.

building.name: Shifting Sands Inn
building.creationInstructions: Include places for the shapeshifters to live. Include a secret location

attributes.description: A tall, sandstone building with an intricately carved wooden door. The interior has rooms of various sizes with adjustable ceilings and floors to accommodate shapeshifters' needs. The rooftop features a sand garden with a small pond that can change shape depending on its visitors' desires.

building.name: The Clever Coyote
building.creationInstructions: Include places for the shapeshifters to live. Include a secret location

attributes.description: A cozy tavern with walls made of cactus wood and a thatched roof. The bar is run by a friendly shapeshifter who can change into any animal on demand, and the menu features dishes made with rare herbs and spices that can only be found in the shifting sands.

building.name: House of Whispers
building.creationInstructions: Include places for the shapeshifters to live. Include a secret location

attributes.description: A modest, adobe house with a hidden entrance that opens to a network of tunnels and caves. The rooms are small but comfortable, and each has a different shape and color depending on its occupant's mood. The house is inhabited by a group of shape-shifters who practice their abilities in secret.

visitors.name: Nahuel Ceron
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Nahuel is a jaguar shapeshifter from the jungles of South America. He comes to House of Whispers to trade exotic fruits and spices.
attributes.mask: Nahuel's mask is made of dark brown leather and has green and yellow feathers on the sides, resembling a jaguar's face.
attributes.negative_attributes: Nahuel is fiercely independent and can be quite territorial. He doesn't like to be told what to do and can become aggressive if he feels threatened.

visitors.name: Shen Mei
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Shen Mei is a fox shapeshifter from China. She comes to House of Whispers to trade medicinal herbs and teas.
attributes.mask: Shen Mei's mask is made of white porcelain and has delicate red and gold hand-painted designs, resembling a fox's face.
attributes.negative_attributes: Shen Mei is very curious and likes to meddle in other people's affairs. She can also be vengeful if someone crosses her.

visitors.name: Liriope Arvanitis
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Liriope is a serpent shapeshifter from Greece. She comes to House of Whispers to trade rare minerals and jewelry.
attributes.mask: Liriope's mask is made of silver and has green and blue gemstones on the forehead and nose, resembling a serpent's face.
attributes.negative_attributes: Liriope is very secretive and doesn't trust easily. She can also be manipulative and use her charm to get what she wants.

ownerOccupants.name: Lilith Nightshade
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: A sultry and alluring thief who uses her shape-shifting powers to infiltrate the houses of the wealthy. Lilith is known for her sharp tongue and quick wit, but also her tendency to use her powers for her own gain. Her mask is black and silver, and her preferred shape is that of a black panther. She is 28 years old and comes to House of Whispers at midnight, staying until dawn.

ownerOccupants.name: Aiden Stormcaller
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: A brooding and mysterious drifter who travels from town to town, using his shape-shifting powers to blend in and avoid detection. Aiden is haunted by his past and is prone to fits of rage and melancholy. His mask is made of leather and feathers, and his preferred shape is that of a raven. He is 35 years old and arrives at House of Whispers at sunset, leaving at dawn.

ownerOccupants.name: Zephyr Windrider
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: A whimsical and carefree artist who creates intricate sculptures out of sand and seafoam. Zephyr is known for his childlike wonder and his knack for finding beauty in even the most mundane objects. His mask is made of seashells and driftwood, and his preferred shape is that of a seagull. He is 27 years old and comes to House of Whispers at noon, staying until dusk.

ownerOccupants.name: Kaela Moonshadow
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: A reserved and enigmatic healer who uses her shape-shifting powers to cure the sick and injured. Kaela is known for her quiet strength and her deep connection to the moon goddess. Her mask is made of bone and fur, and her preferred shape is that of a white wolf. She is 32 years old and comes to House of Whispers at dawn, staying until noon.

ownerOccupants.name: Dax Shadowstalker
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: A fierce and honorable warrior who uses his shape-shifting powers to protect his people from harm. Dax is known for his loyalty and his steadfast dedication to his cause. His mask is made of obsidian and antlers, and his preferred shape is that of a black bear. He is 40 years old and arrives at House of Whispers at midnight, leaving at dawn.

children.name: The interior of the House of Whispers is a maze-like network of tunnels and caves, with walls made of smooth sandstone and illuminated by dimly glowing crystals. Each room is small but cozy, with furnishings that seem to shift and change depending on the occupant's mood. The overall atmosphere is one of mystery and magic, as whispers and rustling sounds seem to emanate from the walls themselves.

The House of Whispers is an unassuming adobe structure that blends seamlessly into the shifting sands. Its walls are rough and textured, with patches of pale yellow, dusty beige, and burnt orange. A simple wooden door marks the entrance, but the windows are small and barred, hinting at the secrets within. A tumble of desert flowers and prickly cacti grow against the walls, providing a splash of color against the surrounding dunes.

instructions.ownerOccupants: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape
instructions.visitors: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

building.name: The Mirage
building.creationInstructions: Include places for the shapeshifters to live. Include a secret location

attributes.description: A grand, sandstone villa with domed roofs and intricate mosaics. The villa is surrounded by a garden of rare desert flowers that blooms only at night. The interior is filled with luxurious furnishings and artifacts from distant lands, and the villa is rumored to be owned by a wealthy shapeshifter who only appears during the full moon.

building.name: The Den
building.creationInstructions: Include places for the shapeshifters to live. Include a secret location

attributes.description: A hidden cave that can only be accessed by a secret passage. The cave is spacious and equipped with various amenities such as hot springs and a small garden. The Den is a meeting place for the members of the secret shapeshifter clan, who gather here to practice their abilities and discuss important matters.

children.name: Dancing Stones

attributes.description: A collection of smooth, round stones that seem to vibrate and hum with energy. It's said that the stones move on their own and that they are linked to the moon and star energy that powers the city's technology. The shape-shifters of Veilvale come here to meditate and connect with the cosmic forces.

children.name: Celestial Gate

attributes.description: A mysterious gate made of a metal that looks like silver but hums with a strange energy. The gate only appears during the full moon, and it's said that those who pass through it can travel to other dimensions and planes of existence.

children.name: The Shimmering Den

attributes.description: a two-storied building with walls made of iridescent seashells and a roof made of woven reeds. It is said that the interior is constantly changing, with rooms appearing and disappearing depending on the mood of the occupants.

ownerOccupants.name: Raven Nightshade
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Raven is a sultry and mysterious woman with a passion for mixology. She is known to create unique and delicious concoctions that are rumored to have magical properties. Her mask is black and silver with intricate markings that resemble a raven's feathers. As a shape-shifter, Raven prefers to take the form of a black cat.

ownerOccupants.name: Thorne Thornbush
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Thorne is a rugged and prickly man who takes pride in his work as a waiter. He is fiercely loyal to his customers and will go to great lengths to ensure their satisfaction. His mask is made of twisted branches and thorns, resembling a thornbush. As a shape-shifter, Thorne most likes to take the form of a grizzly bear.

ownerOccupants.name: Sable Shadowsong
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Sable is a passionate and creative chef who's always experimenting with new flavors and ingredients. She's known for her bold and often daring dishes that are as beautiful as they are delicious. Her mask is white and black with intricate designs reminiscent of a piano's keys. As a shape-shifter, Sable most likes to take the form of a black panther.

children.name: The person in the picture is wearing a white and black mask with intricate designs that resemble a piano's keys. The mask covers their face, leaving only their eyes visible. Their hair is black and styled in a messy bun with a few strands falling on their forehead. They have a confident and determined expression.

ownerOccupants.name: Echo Songbird
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Echo is a beautiful and ethereal singer who's known for her haunting melodies that leave audiences entranced. She's a bit of a recluse, preferring to spend most of her time alone. Her mask is made of white feathers and resembles a bird's beak. As a shape-shifter, Echo most likes to take the form of a snow owl.

ownerOccupants.name: Willow Moonflower
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Willow is an graceful and fluid dancer who captivates audiences with her movements. She's known for her improvisational style and ability to evoke a wide range of emotions through her dance. Her mask is made of silver and green leaves that resemble a willow tree. As a shape-shifter, Willow most likes to take the form of a river otter.

ownerOccupants.name: Mystic Starlight
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Mystic is a whimsical and enigmatic bartender who's known for serving drinks that are always a bit magical. She's a bit of a free spirit and is constantly changing her appearance and style. Her mask is made of rainbow-hued fairy wings. As a shape-shifter, Mystic most likes to take the form of a unicorn.

visitors.name: Aurora Nightshade
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Aurora is a mysterious figure who visits The Shimmering Den only at night. She wears a mask in the shape of a crescent moon, and often takes on the form of a black panther. Some say she is a powerful sorceress, while others whisper that she is a cursed spirit seeking redemption.

visitors.name: Silas Frost
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Silas is a tall and intimidating figure with icy eyes and a barbed tongue. He wears a mask that resembles a horned demon and often takes on the form of a giant wolf. He comes to The Shimmering Den to trade rare herbs and potions, but is known to cause trouble when provoked.

visitors.name: Luna Silverheart
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Luna is a gentle and kind soul who wears a mask in the shape of a delicate butterfly. She often takes on the form of a silver fox and comes to The Shimmering Den to share stories and songs. However, she can also be naive and trusting, which has led her into trouble in the past.

visitors.name: Malachi Shadowdancer
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Malachi is a skilled thief and rogue who wears a mask in the shape of a raven. He often takes on the form of a shadowy serpent and comes to The Shimmering Den to fence stolen goods. He is charming and charismatic, but can also be ruthless and dangerous.

visitors.name: Arietta Wildheart
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Arietta is a free-spirited druid who wears a mask made of leaves and flowers. She often takes on the form of a graceful deer and comes to The Shimmering Den to share her knowledge of nature and healing. However, she can also be impulsive and reckless, especially when it comes to protecting the environment.

children.name: The Shimmering Den is a whimsical two-story building that looks like it belongs in a fairytale. Its walls are made of iridescent seashells that shimmer in the sun, with hints of green, blue, and purple hues. The roof is made of intricately woven reeds, giving the appearance of a natural thatched roof. A small balcony with a guardrail made of seaweed adds a charming touch to the structure.

Inside The Shimmering Den, the rooms are like shifting dreams, with walls that pulse and flow like water, and floors that shimmer with an otherworldly light. Each room is different and unexpected, with furniture and decor that seems to be alive, constantly morphing to fit the needs of the occupants. The air is thick with a heady scent of spices and incense, and the sound of soft music can be heard in the distance.
Raven Nightshade
children.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, artsy types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Raven is a mysterious figure with a talent for mixing potions and brews. They wear a raven mask made of black feathers and silver, and prefer to shift into the form of a nocturnal bird. Raven is often quiet and aloof, but can be friendly to those who show a genuine interest in their craft. They have a tendency to hold a grudge and have been known to serve patrons dubious cocktails as revenge.

children.name: The person known as Raven Nightshade is tall and slender, with long, jet-black hair that cascades down their back. Their raven mask is intricately crafted, with shiny silver details and feathers that create a striking contrast against their pale skin. They are dressed in a long, flowing black robe, and their piercing gaze seems to hold a hint of both mystery and danger.
Phoenix Fireheart
children.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, artsy types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Phoenix is a fiery performer with a love for dancing and acrobatics. They wear a mask made of flames and feathers, and prefer to shift into the form of a phoenix. Phoenix can be quite impulsive and unpredictable, but always brings a sense of excitement to any performance. They have a tendency to hog the spotlight and can be oblivious to the needs of others.

children.name: The person known as Phoenix Fireheart is a young adult with a slim build and toned muscles. They have long, fiery-red hair and piercing green eyes that seem to glow in the darkness. They wear a mask made of flames and feathers, which gives them an otherworldly appearance. Their clothing is tight-fitting and designed for flexibility, with bright colors and intricate patterns.
Sable Shadowsong

children.name: The Sandstone Sanctuary

attributes.description: a temple made of sandstone, with intricate carvings depicting the different stages of transformation that a shifter can go through. Inside, there are chambers for meditation and ritualistic ceremonies, and a pool of warm sand where shifters can shed their skins.

ownerOccupants.name: Sable Thorn
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Sable Thorn is a solemn figure that seems to embody the wisdom and knowledge of the ages. They have been the head priest of the Sandstone Sanctuary for many years and are trusted by all the members of the temple. Sable Thorn is a master of the shifting arts and can transform into any animal they desire. Their mask is shaped like a wolf's head, and their fur is painted black with a single silver stripe down their forehead. They prefer to take the form of a great horned owl.

children.name: The person known as Sable Thorn is a tall and slender figure with long, flowing white hair that cascades down their back. Their piercing green eyes seem to hold a deep well of knowledge and experience. Their face is hidden behind a black mask shaped like a wolf's head, with intricate silver designs etched into the surface. They wear a long, flowing robe made of black silk embroidered with silver threads, and their hands are adorned with delicate silver rings.

ownerOccupants.name: Moss Wind
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Moss Wind is a young and eager acolyte who hopes to one day become a priest like Sable Thorn. They are always seeking knowledge and love to explore the hidden corners of the maze. Moss Wind is a skilled weaver and often creates beautiful masks for the members of the temple. Their own mask is made of woven vines and adorned with bright flowers. They prefer to take the form of a playful fox.

ownerOccupants.name: Silk Weaver
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Silk Weaver is an enigmatic figure that often appears to be lost in thought. They are a master weaver and create intricate tapestries that depict the different forms that shifters can take. Silk Weaver is known for their unpredictable nature and can shift into any animal they desire, even ones that are rarely seen. Their mask is made of silk and embroidered with intricate patterns. They prefer to take the form of a mysterious jaguar.

children.name: The person known as Silk Weaver is a thin and tall individual with deep-set eyes that seem to hold secrets. They have long, flowing hair that matches the color of their mask, which covers most of their face except for their sharp cheekbones and pointed chin. They wear loose and flowing robes made of shimmering silk that seem to blend in with their surroundings.

ownerOccupants.name: Stone Walker
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Stone Walker is a solemn figure that always seems to be lost in thought. They are a skilled stonemason and have contributed many of the intricate carvings that adorn the temple. Stone Walker has a deep connection to the earth and can shift into any animal that lives underground. Their mask is made of sandstone and is adorned with intricate carvings. They prefer to take the form of a powerful badger.

children.name: The person known as Stone Walker is a tall and lanky figure with a serious expression. They have long, tangled hair that falls to their shoulders and a prominent nose. Their skin is weathered and roughened from years of working with stone, and they wear a flowing robe with a pattern of interlocking circles. The sandstone mask they wear is intricately carved with symbols of the earth and animals, and seems to almost blend in with their skin.

visitors.name: Esmei Nox
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Esmei is a tall and lanky shifter who prefers the form of a black panther. They wear a mask made of obsidian, and are known for their sharp tongue and dark sense of humor. Esmei has a reputation for causing trouble and being unpredictable, but is also admired for their bravery and ferocity.

visitors.name: Kaela Sol
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Kaela is a small and agile shifter who likes to take the form of a hummingbird. She wears a mask made of feathers and glittering stones, and is often seen flitting about in the gardens of the Sandstone Sanctuary. Kaela is known for her boundless energy and curiosity, but can also be flighty and unreliable.

visitors.name: Nadir Iskandar
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Nadir is a charismatic and enigmatic shifter who often takes the form of a wolf. He wears a mask made of polished wood and silver, and is rumored to be a powerful shaman who can communicate with spirits. Nadir is respected and feared by many, but also has a reputation for being manipulative and secretive.

visitors.name: Rhiannon Apfel
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Rhiannon is a mysterious and alluring shifter who favors the form of a snake. She wears a mask made of gold and precious stones, and is said to possess hypnotic powers. Rhiannon is a skilled healer and diviner, but is also rumored to have a dark side and to be involved in forbidden practices.

children.name: The Sandstone Sanctuary is a beautiful temple made entirely of sandstone, with intricate carvings covering every inch of the facade. The entrance is marked by a large arched door and two towering pillars, each with a different animal head on top. A circular dome, adorned with a celestial map, crowns the building, and the whole structure is surrounded by sand dunes, giving it a sense of both stability and transience.

The entrance of the Sandstone Sanctuary is flanked by two massive sandstone pillars, intricately carved with spirals, feathers, and animal motifs. Once inside, the main chamber is bathed in an amber light that filters through the stained-glass windows depicting moon phases and animal spirits. The walls and ceilings are adorned with bas-reliefs showing the journey of the shifter, from their human form to their animal form and back, accompanied by symbols of the four elements and the phases of the sun and moon. The pool of warm sand in the center of the room is surrounded by low benches and cushions, and is the focal point of the space, where shifters can shed their skins and meditate in a trance-like state.
Sable Thorn
children.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Sable Thorn is a solemn figure that seems to embody the wisdom and knowledge of the ages. They have been the head priest of the Sandstone Sanctuary for many years and are trusted by all the members of the temple. Sable Thorn is a master of the shifting arts and can transform into any animal they desire. Their mask is shaped like a wolf's head, and their fur is painted black with a single silver stripe down their forehead. They prefer to take the form of a great horned owl.

children.name: The person known as Sable Thorn is a tall and slender figure with long, flowing white hair that cascades down their back. Their piercing green eyes seem to hold a deep well of knowledge and experience. Their face is hidden behind a black mask shaped like a wolf's head, with intricate silver designs etched into the surface. They wear a long, flowing robe made of black silk embroidered with silver threads, and their hands are adorned with delicate silver rings.
Silk Weaver
children.creationInstructions: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

attributes.description: Silk Weaver is an enigmatic figure that often appears to be lost in thought. They are a master weaver and create intricate tapestries that depict the different forms that shifters can take. Silk Weaver is known for their unpredictable nature and can shift into any animal they desire, even ones that are rarely seen. Their mask is made of silk and embroidered with intricate patterns. They prefer to take the form of a mysterious jaguar.

children.name: The person known as Silk Weaver is a thin and tall individual with deep-set eyes that seem to hold secrets. They have long, flowing hair that matches the color of their mask, which covers most of their face except for their sharp cheekbones and pointed chin. They wear loose and flowing robes made of shimmering silk that seem to blend in with their surroundings.
Stone Walker

instructions.ownerOccupants: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take
instructions.visitors: Describe eccentric and weird people, shaman types. For each person describe their mask. Say what form each shape-shifter most likes to take

children.name: The Mirage

attributes.description: a mysterious building that seems to appear and disappear at random intervals. It is said to be a portal to other dimensions, and that only the most skilled and daring shifters can enter without getting lost forever.

Sarai is a young sorceress with a talent for potion-making. Her family has been practicing magic for generations and she inherited the gift at a young age. She is a skilled shifter, able to take on the form of any creature she desires. However, her curiosity often leads her into dangerous situations, and she can be quite reckless in her pursuit of knowledge.

Jahanara is a traveler from a distant land, where she learned the secrets of the stars and the art of astrolabe-making. She is fascinated by the maze of Veilvale and seeks to map its intricate patterns. She is a cautious and methodical person, but her obsession with the maze can sometimes cloud her judgment, making her take risks that others would consider foolish.

Aurelio is a charismatic rogue who makes a living as a spy and a thief. He is a master of disguise and can shift his appearance and his voice with ease. He is always looking for new challenges and new opportunities to make a profit, but his lack of scruples and his tendency to double-cross his partners often get him into trouble.

Ibrahim is a scholar and a historian, who specializes in the study of ancient civilizations. He comes to Veilvale in search of a legendary library that is said to contain the secrets of the universe. He is a patient and methodical person, but his obsession with the library can sometimes make him lose sight of the present and neglect his own well-being.

The Mirage is a curious building that appears to be made of shimmering sand and coral, with no discernible entrance or exit. Many have tried to enter it, but few have returned, and those who do tell conflicting and confusing stories. Some say it leads to a paradise where wishes come true, others say it's a trap that feeds on desires and fears, and others say it's a prison for the mind and soul. The Mirage seems to appear and disappear at random intervals, often luring unwary travelers to their doom. The locals avoid it and warn outsiders not to trust its illusions.

Sethra is a shifter who can take the form of a hummingbird. She claims to have entered The Mirage and returned unharmed, and that she has seen wonders beyond human comprehension. However, she also seems to be obsessed with The Mirage and spends most of her time staring at it or trying to find a way back in. She is flighty and erratic, and her conversations often veer into incomprehensible rants. Some suspect she has lost touch with reality and is living in her own delusions.

Khalid is a nomad who claims to have traveled through many dimensions and seen many wonders. He wears a turban made of silk and a robe made of camel hair, and carries a long staff with a crystal on top. He speaks eloquently and confidently, but often contradicts himself and embellishes his stories. He seems to be searching for something, but is not sure what it is. He is also quick to anger and can become violent if provoked.

Amara is a healer who practices a mix of herbalism, meditation, and energy work. She wears a cloak made of moonstone and carries a pouch of crystals and herbs. She is calm and serene, and speaks softly and compassionately. She claims to have sensed the presence of powerful entities in The Mirage, but warns that they are not benevolent and can cause harm to those who seek them. She is highly empathic and can feel other people's emotions, which can be overwhelming at times.

The Mirage is also rumored to be a gathering place for dark magic practitioners, who perform unspeakable rituals and sacrifices in its hidden chambers. However, no one has ever been able to prove or disprove these claims, as the Mirage remains an enigma that defies understanding and logic.

children.name: The interior of The Mirage is a paradoxical blend of opulence and minimalism. The entrance leads to a grand hall lined with mirrors that reflect a constantly changing landscape. Off the hall are four rooms, each decorated in a different style from different eras. The rooms seem to shift and change, sometimes appearing empty, sometimes filled with strange artifacts and creatures.

The Mirage is a small, square building made of sandstone blocks, with a flat roof and no windows. Its surface is covered in intricate carvings of spirals, geometric shapes, and animal forms, which seem to shift and flow like dunes in the wind. The main entrance is a tall, narrow archway made of polished obsidian, which reflects the surrounding desert landscape like a dark mirror.
The Shifting Hearth

attributes.description: A large, circular building made of sandstone and clay, with a domed roof that can shift and open to the sky. Inside, there is a central hearth that is always burning, surrounded by winding corridors and hidden rooms that can change shape and size to accommodate any visitor. This is the main gathering place for the shape-shifting clan, where they share stories, food, and secrets.

ownerOccupants.name: Raven Moon
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Raven is the high priestess of the moon goddess and the keeper of the sacred crystals that power the city's technology. She is a wise and powerful shaman who can shape-shift into a raven and travel between realms. Her mask is made of black feathers and silver thread, and she prefers to shape-shift into a human or a wolf.

ownerOccupants.name: Sage Pepper
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Sage is the head chef of the Shifting Hearth and the master of alchemical cooking. She can turn ordinary ingredients into magical dishes that can heal, transform or intoxicate. She is a cheerful and mischievous person who loves to experiment with flavors and textures. Her mask is made of colorful spices and herbs, and she prefers to shape-shift into a cat or a dragonfly.

children.name: Sage Pepper is a person with a round face, bright and mischievous eyes, and rosy cheeks. They wear a colorful spice and herb mask that covers most of their face, with the eyes of the mask being the same bright blue as their own eyes. They have short curly hair that is a muted red color, and they are wearing a chef's coat.

ownerOccupants.name: Oak Song
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Oak is the bard of Veilvale and the guardian of its tales and legends. He can weave spells with his voice and his harp and transport his audience to other worlds and times. He is a melancholic and thoughtful person who loves to explore the mysteries of existence. His mask is made of tree bark and green jewels, and he prefers to shape-shift into a bird or a deer.

ownerOccupants.name: Mist Flower
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Mist is the healer of Veilvale and the keeper of the secret garden where the most powerful herbs and flowers grow. She can cure any illness or injury with her touch and her knowledge of nature. She is a gentle and empathetic person who loves to connect with other beings. Her mask is made of lilies and dew drops, and she prefers to shape-shift into a fawn or a butterfly.

ownerOccupants.name: Ember Forge
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Ember is the blacksmith of Veilvale and the creator of its weapons and tools. He can shape metal with his bare hands and imbue it with magical properties. He is a proud and stubborn person who values honor and duty. His mask is made of iron and fire, and he prefers to shape-shift into a lion or a phoenix.

children.name: Ember Forge is a person of medium build, with muscular arms and a thick beard. He wears a blacksmith's apron over a brown leather vest and pants, and his bare feet are covered in soot. His mask is made of iron and shaped like a snarling lion, with fiery eyes that seem to glow in the dim light.

ownerOccupants.name: Moth Sight
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Moth is the oracle of Veilvale and the seer of its futures and pasts. She can read the patterns of the stars and the signs of the elements and predict the outcomes of any event. She is a mysterious and aloof person who prefers solitude and contemplation. Her mask is made of moth wings and silver thread, and she prefers to shape-shift into a bat or an owl.

children.name: The person known as Moth Sight wears a silver and moth-wing mask that obscures their face, giving them an air of mystery and intrigue. Their long hair is a silvery-white color, and their dark cloak blends into the shadows around them. Their piercing gaze seems to hold a knowledge of secrets both ancient and new.

visitors.name: Raven Darkwing
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Raven is a tall, slender figure with midnight black feathers covering his entire body. He frequently visits The Shifting Hearth to show off his wings, which stretch out to a wingspan of over 9 feet. His mask is intricately crafted to resemble a raven's beak and is made of ebony and gold.
attributes.mask: Ebony and gold raven beak mask

visitors.name: Sable Moonshadow
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Sable is a mysterious figure with fur as black as coal and eyes as green as emeralds. She prefers to keep to herself and rarely speaks to anyone outside of her immediate family. Her mask is a simple black velvet half-mask with silver crescent moons and her preferred shape is that of a black panther.
attributes.mask: Black velvet half-mask with silver crescent moons

visitors.name: Briar Thornbloom
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Briar is a bubbly and outgoing young woman with hair that changes color with her mood. She loves to spend her time exploring the maze and discovering new paths. Her mask is a bright pink half-mask with silver thorns and her preferred shape is that of a hummingbird.
attributes.mask: Bright pink half-mask with silver thorns

visitors.name: Asher Stoneheart
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Asher is a brooding figure with stone-gray skin and eyes that change color with his emotions. He is often found sitting alone by the central hearth, lost in thought. His mask is a plain gray half-mask that covers the upper half of his face and his preferred shape is that of a mountain lion.
attributes.mask: Plain gray half-mask that covers the upper half of his face

visitors.name: Lark Songweaver
visitors.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Lark is a lively and energetic figure with feathers the color of the sunrise. She can often be found dancing around the hearth, singing songs and telling stories. Her mask is a bright yellow half-mask with silver musical notes and her preferred shape is that of a yellow canary.
attributes.mask: Bright yellow half-mask with silver musical notes

children.name: The Shifting Hearth is a circular building with sandstone walls that seem to blend seamlessly with the desert landscape around it. The clay roof is domed and adorned with intricate designs, and appears to be in a state of perpetual motion, shifting and opening to reveal the blue sky above. A large wooden door, studded with brass, leads into the building, which is surrounded by a low wall made of sandstone blocks.

As you enter The Shifting Hearth, you are greeted by a warm glow emanating from the central hearth. The winding corridors are lined with intricate tapestries depicting the history of the shape-shifting clan, and the air is filled with the sweet smell of sandalwood and cinnamon. Each room off the main corridor is unique, with colorful tiles and cushions, and some have hidden compartments and passages that lead to other parts of the building. The overall feel is one of comfort, familiarity, and mystery.
Wren Oakwood
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Wren is a wise and respected shaman who is known for her deep connection to the spirits of the maze and the moon goddess. She has a kind and gentle soul, but can be stubborn and set in her ways at times. Her mask is made of woven vines and feathers, and she prefers to shift into the form of a white owl.

children.name: Wren Oakwood is a wise-looking elderly woman with long, silver hair that cascades down her back in loose waves. Her face is adorned with intricate markings, and her eyes are a bright, piercing blue. She wears a mask made of woven vines and feathers, which enhances her otherworldly appearance.
Garnet Redwood
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Garnet is the head cook of The Shifting Hearth and is known for her incredible skills in the kitchen. She is a warm and nurturing person, but can be fiercely protective of her recipes. Her mask is made of carved wood and painted with intricate designs, and she prefers to shift into the form of a black bear.

children.name: The person in the picture is of medium height with a round and friendly face. She has long, curly hair the color of a blazing fire, and her warm brown eyes are bright and expressive. She is wearing a simple linen dress with an apron over it, and her hands are covered in flour. Her wooden mask is intricately carved with images of trees and animals, and it seems to have a life of its own.
Eira Silvermist
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Eira is a gifted storyteller who spins tales of magic and wonder that capture the hearts of all who hear them. She has a mischievous and playful personality, but can be stubborn and reluctant to admit when she's wrong. Her mask is made of silver and engraved with intricate patterns, and she prefers to shift into the form of a snow leopard.

children.name: Eira Silvermist is a slender and graceful individual with long, flowing silver hair that cascades down her back. Her expressive eyes are a bright shade of blue that seem to sparkle with mischief, and her delicate features are softened by a mischievous smile. She wears a silver mask with intricate engravings that seem to shimmer in the light, adding to her enigmatic aura.
Sable Nightshade
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Sable is a fierce and skilled guard who will stop at nothing to protect her fellow shape-shifters. She is fiercely loyal and dedicated, but can be short-tempered and quick to act without thinking. Her mask is made of dark leather and adorned with sharp spikes, and she prefers to shift into the form of a wolf.

children.name: The person known as Sable Nightshade stands tall and with a confident stance. They have sharp features, including a strong jawline and piercing eyes that seem to glow in the darkness. Adorned with a mask made of dark leather and sharp spikes, they wear clothing that is practical and allows for ease of movement. The person's hair is dark and wild, adding to their fierce appearance.
Sage Pepper
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Sage is the head chef of the Shifting Hearth and the master of alchemical cooking. She can turn ordinary ingredients into magical dishes that can heal, transform or intoxicate. She is a cheerful and mischievous person who loves to experiment with flavors and textures. Her mask is made of colorful spices and herbs, and she prefers to shape-shift into a cat or a dragonfly.

Their long hair is a silvery-white color, and their dark cloak blends into the shadows around them. Their piercing gaze seems to hold a knowledge of secrets both ancient and new.
Iris Sunflower

attributes.description: Iris is a kind-hearted, but insecure shape-shifter who struggles with her identity. She comes to The Shifting Hearth to seek guidance from the elders and to make friends with other shape-shifters.

children.name: Raven Darkwing
children.creationInstructions: describe each person's mask and their preferred shape

attributes.description: Raven is a tall, slender figure with midnight black feathers covering his entire body. He frequently visits The Shifting Hearth to show off his wings, which stretch out to a wingspan of over 9 feet. His mask is intricately crafted to resemble a raven's beak and is made of ebony and gold.
