children.name: Silver Gears
children.creationInstructions: include neighborhoods that focus on the automatons

attributes.description: This neighborhood is entirely dedicated to the study and development of automatons. The streets are lined with laboratories and factories where engineers and inventors tinker with machines of all shapes and sizes. Silver Gears is also home to the Automaton Guild, a prestigious organization that oversees the production and distribution of automatons in Veilvale.

landmark.name: The Clockwork Plaza
landmark.creationInstructions: make automaton and machine related landmarks

attributes.description: A bustling square filled with intricate clockwork sculptures that move and chime in unison, marking the passing of time. In the center of the plaza stands the Grand Clock, a towering masterpiece of engineering that can predict the future with uncanny accuracy.

landmark.name: The Singing Workshop
landmark.creationInstructions: make automaton and machine related landmarks

attributes.description: A charming little shop where skilled craftsmen create musical automatons that can play any instrument and sing any song. The windows are always open, and the melodious sounds that emanate from within can be heard from blocks away.

landmark.name: The Steam Gardens
landmark.creationInstructions: make automaton and machine related landmarks

attributes.description: A collection of lush gardens and greenhouses filled with exotic plants and flowers that are tended to by steam-powered gardening machines. The air is thick with the scent of blooming flowers and the soothing sound of softly hissing steam.

landmark.name: The Elemental Foundry
landmark.creationInstructions: make automaton and machine related landmarks

attributes.description: A massive furnace that burns with a strange, otherworldly flame. Here, the alchemists of Veilvale craft elemental golems, machines infused with the power of fire, water, earth, or air. The golems are fiercely loyal to their creators and can perform incredible feats of strength and magic.

landmark.name: The Aviary of Wonders
landmark.creationInstructions: make automaton and machine related landmarks

attributes.description: A surreal aviary filled with mechanical birds of all shapes and sizes, from tiny hummingbirds to giant golden eagles. Each bird is made of shining brass and precious gems, and they can sing, fly, and even talk. The Aviary is a favorite spot for couples to walk hand-in-hand and listen to the sweet songs of the birds.

A towering structure made of brass and iron, with gears and cogs that turn incessantly, emitting whirring and ticking sounds that echo through the streets. The Clockwork Tower is the headquarters of the Automaton Guild, and only a privileged few are allowed to enter its inner workings.

A sprawling laboratory filled with pipes and valves that hiss and release steam, the Steam-Powered Lab is where the most cutting-edge experiments on automatons take place. The walls are lined with shelves filled with tools and spare parts, and the air is thick with the smell of oil and grease.

A cozy workshop where the master clockmaker works tirelessly on intricate timepieces and automatons. The workshop is filled with the sound of delicate chimes and tiny gears turning, and the air is perfumed with the scent of wood and freshly-oiled metal.

A popular tavern where the local engineers and inventors come to relax and exchange ideas. The tavern is decorated with gears and cogs of all shapes and sizes, and the walls are lined with diagrams and blueprints. The bar is stocked with strange and exotic drinks, and the food is hearty and filling.
The driven inventor behind the creation of a mechanical bird that can sing in perfect tune with the natural ones. Often seen hunched over a sketchbook, furiously scribbling her next design.
The eccentric mechanical engineer who is known for adding impossible gears and unnecessary whistles to his robots. Always found sipping on a large mug of beer as he gazes at his creations with pride.
The brilliant inventor who created a device that can translate the language of birds. Often found mumbling to himself as he scribbles down notes, surrounded by stacks of books and scrolls.
The young prodigy who created a machine that can generate electricity from the movement of water. Often brash and arrogant, but always eager to prove himself to his peers.
The grizzled old drunkard who is always found at the bar, telling tall tales of his adventures in far-off lands. Often belligerent and prone to picking fights with anyone who crosses him.
The jovial brewer who supplies the tavern with all its exotic drinks. Always in a good mood, and eager to share his knowledge of brewing techniques and local flora.

Oscar is a gruff and no-nonsense bartender who takes pride in his creations. He is known for coming up with strange and daring concoctions that rarely disappoint. Oscar grew up in the maze and has seen his fair share of dangers and mysteries, which is why he is always ready with a weapon or a clever solution. However, his tough exterior hides a soft spot for animals and children.

Aria is a young and ambitious cook who dreams of opening her own restaurant one day. She is passionate about finding new ingredients and flavors, and spends most of her time experimenting with recipes and techniques. Aria is also a skilled inventor and has created several devices that help her in the kitchen. However, her perfectionism and impatience can often lead to conflicts with coworkers and customers.

Sven is a brilliant inventor who has created several groundbreaking machines and devices. He is always eager to share his knowledge and help others with their projects, but can sometimes come off as arrogant or aloof. Sven has a deep fascination with clockwork and automatons, and spends most of his time tinkering with his creations. However, his obsession with perfection can sometimes drive him to madness.

Elena is a talented musician who plays a variety of instruments, from the harp to the flute to the accordion. She is often hired to perform at weddings, funerals, and other events, and has a loyal following of fans. Elena is also a skilled storyteller and can captivate an audience with her tales of adventure and romance. However, her tendency to drink too much and flirt with customers can sometimes lead to trouble.

children.name: The Gearhead Tavern is a small, wooden building with a sloping roof made of copper plates. The front of the tavern has a large, circular window that showcases the intricate workings of a clock that is situated inside. The entrance to the tavern is a set of double doors with brass handles and hinges. On either side of the entrance, there are large metal gears that serve as decorative elements.

As you enter the Gearhead Tavern, you are welcomed by the sound of clinking glasses and the chatter of inventors discussing their latest creations. The interior is filled with the warm glow of oil lamps that cast shadows on the walls covered in drawings and diagrams. The main room is dominated by a large wooden bar adorned with a variety of strange and wondrous gears and cogs, and behind it, a bartender expertly mixes potions and concoctions to quench the thirst of the patrons.

attributes.description: A massive factory where molten metal is poured into molds and shaped into the various components of automatons. The heat is oppressive, and the noise of the machinery is deafening. The workers wear heavy protective gear and move with practiced ease around the glowing furnaces.

A grand mansion that belongs to the wealthy and eccentric inventor, Lord Gilded Gears. The mansion is a maze of hidden passages and secret rooms, and some say that it is guarded by automatons that can shoot fire from their eyes. The gardens are filled with exotic plants and strange mechanical contraptions.

instructions.landmark: make automaton and machine related landmarks

children.name: Clockwork Manor

attributes.description: A grand mansion made entirely of brass and copper, with gears and cogs that turn the hands of the clock on the tower. It is said that the clock of Clockwork Manor can predict the future, but only if you know how to read it.

visitors.name: Jules Cogsworth
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Jules is a clockmaker who moved to Veilvale to study the automatons. He's a perfectionist and a bit of a snob when it comes to craftsmanship. He wears a mask that looks like a clock face with moving gears and hands.

visitors.name: Li Mei
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Li Mei is a trader from a far-off land who collects exotic automatons. She has a sharp eye for detail and knows the value of every piece. She wears a mask that looks like a phoenix, with feathers that flutter when she talks.

visitors.name: Gunnar Thickbeard
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Gunnar is a dwarf who specializes in repairing damaged automatons. He's gruff and blunt, but he knows his craft inside and out. He wears a mask that looks like a metal helmet, with a beard made of gears and wrenches.

visitors.name: Zara Nightingale
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Zara is a bard who incorporates automatons into her performances. She's a free spirit who loves to improvise and experiment. She wears a mask that has a built-in harmonica, which she uses to accompany her songs.

visitors.name: Yanis Wrenchhammer
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Yanis is an inventor who creates new types of automatons. He's always eager to share his ideas with anyone who will listen. He wears a mask that looks like a combination of a wrench and a hammer, with eyebrows made of springs.

ownerOccupants.name: Jasper Blackwood
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Jasper was born into a family of clockmakers and has inherited an obsession with timekeeping. He is very skilled at creating intricate mechanisms and loves nothing more than spending hours tinkering in his workshop. However, Jasper is also very aloof and can come across as distant and unapproachable. He rarely talks to anyone outside of his family or work and has been known to disappear for days on end, lost in thought.

ownerOccupants.name: Niamh O'Hara
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Niamh is a recent arrival from the Emerald Isles, who has brought with her a wealth of knowledge about Celtic and Gaelic clockmaking. She is a bubbly and friendly person, who loves to share her stories and traditions with others. However, Niamh has a tendency to be a bit scatterbrained and often forgets appointments or deadlines. Despite this, she is very talented at her craft and has a natural talent for repairing and restoring antique clocks.

ownerOccupants.name: Hans Richter
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Hans is a tall and imposing figure, with a thick accent and a no-nonsense attitude. He comes from a long line of German clockmakers and is very proud of his heritage. Hans is an expert in designing and building automatons and has created several that take care of the manor. However, he can also be very stubborn and has a tendency to ignore the opinions of others.

ownerOccupants.name: Yuri Nakamura
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Yuri is a young and ambitious engineer, who has recently graduated from a prestigious university in the Far East. She is very passionate about her work and has a keen eye for detail. Yuri is also a trans woman, who is still struggling with discrimination and prejudice from some of her colleagues. Despite this, she has refused to give up on her dreams and is determined to prove that she is just as capable as anyone else.

ownerOccupants.name: Isabella Santoro
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Isabella is an older woman, who has been working as a clockmaker for over thirty years. She is a quiet and reserved person, who prefers to keep to herself. However, Isabella is also very knowledgeable about the history of clockmaking and has a collection of antique clocks that she has restored herself. She can be very protective of her work and has been known to get into arguments with other clockmakers over the best way to repair a clock.

ownerOccupants.name: Alpha
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Alpha is the head automaton caretaker of Clockwork Manor. He is a tall, humanoid robot made entirely of brass and copper, with glowing blue eyes and a calm voice. Alpha is responsible for maintaining the other automatons in the manor and ensuring that they are functioning correctly. He is very good at his job and takes pride in his work. However, Alpha can also be very rigid and has a tendency to follow the rules too closely.

children.name: In the picture, we see a tall, humanoid figure made entirely of brass and copper. Its glowing blue eyes add an air of mystery to the otherwise mechanical appearance. The person has a calm, almost serene expression on their face, hinting at inner peace and a sense of purpose. Their metallic frame gives off a warm, comforting glow, suggesting the presence of some sort of inner energy source.

ownerOccupants.name: Beta
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Beta is a small and agile automaton, designed to clean and maintain the clock towers of Clockwork Manor. He is a mischievous robot, who loves playing pranks on the other automatons and the clockmakers. Despite his playful nature, Beta is also very efficient and does his job well. However, he can be very difficult to catch, as he has a habit of hiding in the clockwork gears.

children.name: The person, Beta, appears very robotic with a small and compact frame made of shiny silver. Its limbs are thin and elongated, with joints resembling that of a clock's gear. Its head is circular with two big glowing eyes that emit a soft green light. Its expressionless face makes it hard to read any emotions or thoughts.
children.creationInstructions: very robotic

children.name: The Clockwork Manor stands tall and magnificent, made entirely of brass and copper with intricate gears and cogs embedded all over its exterior. The towering clock on the topmost floor is impossible to miss, and its hands move with a mechanical precision that seems almost magical. The mansion's windows are made of stained glass, each pane depicting a different clockface, and the front door is adorned with a brass doorknob that resembles a cog.

Upon entering Clockwork Manor, you are greeted by a sprawling foyer adorned with intricate brass chandeliers and a polished marble floor. The walls are lined with gears and clock faces, each one telling a different time and spinning at different speeds. A sweeping staircase leads up to the second floor where a series of ornate hallways lead to various rooms, including a library filled with leather-bound books and a study with a large globe and maps of distant lands. The overall feel of the interior is one of mechanical elegance, with the tick-tock of clockwork echoing throughout the halls.
Hiroshi Nakamura
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description:
Hiroshi is an imaginative inventor who dreams of revolutionizing the world with his machines. He is always tinkering with new ideas and prototypes, and can often be found lost in thought as he contemplates new designs. Hiroshi has a tendecy to get carried away with his latest invention and neglect his other work, which can cause problems for those relying on him. 
Mask: Hiroshi's mask is a vivid blue color with a series of metallic tubes that run down the sides of his face, hissing and whistling with each breath he takes.

children.name: Hiroshi Nakamura is a man with a thin, angular face and sharp, focused eyes. He has short, jet-black hair with streaks of electric blue running through it. His metallic blue mask covers the upper half of his face and has intricate patterns of silver tubing that give him an otherworldly appearance.
Jia Li
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description:
Jia is a hardworking apprentice clockmaker who is eager to learn as much as possible from her mentors. She is determined to prove her worth and often works long hours to perfect her craft. Jia can be a bit timid at times, but she is fiercely loyal to those she cares about. 
Mask: Jia wears a porcelain mask painted to look like a clock face, with delicate gold markings tracing the hands of the timepiece.

children.name: Jia Li is a young woman with striking features. She has a heart-shaped face framed by silky black hair that falls in soft waves. Her eyes are almond-shaped and dark brown, and her lips are full and pink. She wears a cream-colored blouse with ruffled sleeves and a brown skirt with a matching apron. On her face, she wears a porcelain mask meticulously painted to resemble a clock, with intricate gold markings tracing its hands.
Cecilia Bright
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask. Include servants and butlers

attributes.description: Cecilia is the head housemaid at Clockwork Manor, responsible for keeping the mansion spotless and running smoothly. She is efficient and organized, but can also be stern and demanding with the other servants. Cecilia wears a mask that resembles a porcelain doll's face, with rosy cheeks and wide eyes.

children.name: The person appears to be middle-aged, with a thin and angular face. They have sharp features, including a pointed nose and high cheekbones. Their hair is pulled tightly back into a bun, and they wear a mask that resembles a porcelain doll's face, with delicate features and painted rosy cheeks.
Reginald Copperfield
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask. Include servants and butlers

attributes.description: Reginald is the butler at Clockwork Manor, responsible for overseeing the staff and serving the master of the house. He is stately and dignified, but can also be aloof and cold towards those he deems beneath him. Reginald wears a mask made of polished copper, with a stern expression and a handlebar mustache.

children.name: Reginald Copperfield is a tall, slender man with a straight posture. He has a sharp, angular face with a prominent nose and thin lips. His eyes are a piercing blue, and his hair is slicked back in a neat, silver sheen. He wears a black suit with a white shirt and a bow tie, and his copper mask gleams in the light.
Alpha
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Alpha is the head automaton caretaker of Clockwork Manor. He is a tall, humanoid robot made entirely of brass and copper, with glowing blue eyes and a calm voice. Alpha is responsible for maintaining the other automatons in the manor and ensuring that they are functioning correctly. He is very good at his job and takes pride in his work. However, Alpha can also be very rigid and has a tendency to follow the rules too closely.

children.name: In the picture, we see a tall, humanoid figure made entirely of brass and copper. Its glowing blue eyes add an air of mystery to the otherwise mechanical appearance. The person has a calm, almost serene expression on their face, hinting at inner peace and a sense of purpose. Their metallic frame gives off a warm, comforting glow, suggesting the presence of some sort of inner energy source.
Beta
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that take care of the manor

attributes.description: Beta is a small and agile automaton, designed to clean and maintain the clock towers of Clockwork Manor. He is a mischievous robot, who loves playing pranks on the other automatons and the clockmakers. Despite his playful nature, Beta is also very efficient and does his job well. However, he can be very difficult to catch, as he has a habit of hiding in the clockwork gears.

children.name: The person, Beta, appears very robotic with a small and compact frame made of shiny silver. Its limbs are thin and elongated, with joints resembling that of a clock's gear. Its head is circular with two big glowing eyes that emit a soft green light. Its expressionless face makes it hard to read any emotions or thoughts.
children.creationInstructions: very robotic

children.name: The Iron Forge

attributes.description: A massive foundry that belches smoke and fire day and night, where blacksmiths and machinists work together to create the toughest and most intricate pieces of metal. The Iron Forge is famous for its ornate gates and railings, which are rumored to possess magical properties.

visitors.name: Ovira Stoneheart
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Ovira is a dwarf with wild curly hair and a bushy beard. He is always dressed in practical leather garb and has a jovial demeanor. He loves to collect rare metals and stones and is always hunting for new treasures to add to his collection.
attributes.mask_description: Ovira's mask is made of beaten copper and is intricately adorned with carvings of dwarven heroes and magical symbols.

visitors.name: Liliana Sivertongue
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Liliana is a half-elf with a sharp tongue and quick wit. She is always impeccably dressed and carries herself with an air of elegance. She is a brilliant architect and has designed some of the most impressive buildings in Veilvale. Her perfectionism can often make her difficult to work with, but her designs are always worth the effort.
attributes.mask_description: Liliana's mask is made of silver and is shaped like a bird of prey, with intricate feathers carved into the metal.

ownerOccupants.name: Garnet Steelheart
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Garnet was born with a hammer in her hand and a spark in her eye. She's been working the forge since she was old enough to hold a tool, and has a reputation for creating some of the strongest and most beautiful weapons in Veilvale. She's fiercely independent and doesn't suffer fools gladly, but is always willing to help out a fellow blacksmith in need. In her free time, Garnet likes to practice her swordplay and tends to a small garden in the courtyard of her home.

ownerOccupants.name: Lysander Gearspark
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Lysander is a genius inventor who spends most of his time tinkering with clockwork mechanisms and steam-powered engines. He's a bit of a recluse, preferring the company of his automatons to that of other people, but he's always eager to share his latest invention with anyone who's interested. Lysander can come across as cold and aloof, but he has a kind heart and a deep love for the machines that he creates.

ownerOccupants.name: Hollis Ironclad
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Hollis is a grizzled veteran of the forge, with scars on his arms and a permanent scowl on his face. He's fiercely loyal to his fellow blacksmiths and would do anything to protect them, but he has a tendency to jump to conclusions and can be quick to anger. Hollis is a master of the art of tempering, and is responsible for making sure that every piece of metal that leaves the forge is as strong as possible.

ownerOccupants.name: Lyra Brightsteam
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Lyra is one of the few female machinists in Veilvale, and she's determined to prove that she's just as good as any man. She's talented and hardworking, but she's also fiercely competitive and can be quick to criticize others. Lyra is responsible for designing and building the automatons that work in the forge, and she takes great pride in her creations.

ownerOccupants.name: Jasper Firebrand
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Jasper is a hot-headed young blacksmith with a talent for working with unusual materials. He's always looking for a challenge and is quick to volunteer for any difficult job that comes his way. Jasper can be a bit reckless at times, and has a tendency to ignore safety protocols in his eagerness to get the job done. Despite his flaws, he's well-liked by his fellow blacksmiths, who admire his passion and his skill.

ownerOccupants.name: Cassius Gearforge
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Cassius is an eccentric machinist who's obsessed with creating the perfect clockwork automaton. He spends most of his time holed up in his workshop, surrounded by piles of gears and springs, and is rarely seen outside. Cassius can come across as aloof and distant, but he's deeply passionate about his work and loves nothing more than seeing one of his creations spring to life.

ownerOccupants.name: Mechanica
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Mechanica is a clockwork automaton that was designed and built by Lysander Gearspark. She's responsible for stoking the fires of the forge, and can often be seen carrying sacks of coal or shoveling ash. Mechanica is programmed to be polite and efficient, but she's also fiercely protective of the other inhabitants of the forge and will rush to their aid if needed.

children.name: Mechanica is a small clockwork automaton made of gleaming silver and brass. Her body is made up of intricate gears, springs, and pistons, and her large round eyes are made of glowing emerald crystals. She wears a simple brown apron over her metallic body and carries a heavy sack of coal over her shoulder with ease.

ownerOccupants.name: Gorgon
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Gorgon is a massive automaton that was built by Lyra Brightsteam to help with the heavy lifting in the forge. He's incredibly strong and durable, and can lift weights that would crush a human. Gorgon is also designed to be intimidating, with a head that resembles that of a fearsome monster. Despite his appearance, he's actually quite friendly and has a soft spot for children.

children.name: The person in the picture is wearing a mask that resembles a peacock's feathers, with delicate golden filigree and gemstones adorning it. They have a long robe made of silk and velvet that shimmers in the light, and is embroidered with intricate patterns of stars and moons. Their hands are covered in silver gauntlets that have sharp claws like a bird of prey.

The Iron Forge stands tall and imposing, with its sturdy walls made of dark, rough-hewn stone. The entrance is marked by a massive set of wrought iron gates, adorned with intricate designs and symbols of unknown meaning. Smoke and fire billow from the chimneys and vents, casting an eerie glow on the surrounding area. The overall effect is one of power and industry, tempered by a touch of mystery and magic.

As one enters The Iron Forge, they are met with a wave of intense heat and the deafening sound of hammering and machinery. The ground floor is dominated by a row of massive forges and anvils, surrounded by piles of raw ore, ingots, and scrap metal. The air is thick with smoke and the glow of molten metal, giving the whole room a reddish hue. A narrow staircase leads up to a platform that encircles the room, providing a view of the entire forge and access to smaller workshops, where artisans work on delicate mechanisms and fine engravings.
Hikaru Nakamura
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Hikaru is a skilled machinist who came to Veilvale from a distant land. He is quiet and reserved, but his work speaks for itself. He has a fascination with clockwork mechanisms and spends his spare time creating intricate timepieces. Hikaru's mask is made of polished brass and has a simple design of gears and cogs. He wears it to protect himself from the metal shavings and dust in the workshop.

children.name: Hikaru Nakamura is a tall, slender man with dark hair and piercing green eyes. He has a serious expression on his face, and his worn leather apron suggests he spends most of his time in his workshop. Hikaru's brass mask covers his lower face and has intricate designs of gears and cogs, hinting at his love for clockwork mechanisms.
Gareth Stonehammer
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Gareth is a dwarf who takes pride in his work and his heritage. He inherited the forge from his father and has been working there since he was a young boy. He is a skilled blacksmith but has a tendency to be stubborn and gruff. Gareth's mask is made of dark iron and has intricate designs of flames and hammers. He wears it to protect himself from the heat and smoke of the forge.

children.name: Gareth Stonehammer is a dwarf of short stature with broad shoulders and muscular arms. He has a thick, bushy beard and a bald head with deep-set, piercing blue eyes. He wears a dark leather apron over his rough-spun clothing, and his hands are rough and calloused from years of working the forge. His mask, made of dark iron, glints in the dim light, and its designs of flames and hammers reflect his passion for his craft.
Khaled al-Mansoor
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Khaled is a master blacksmith from a far-off desert land. He has a quiet demeanor but takes his work very seriously. He specializes in creating intricate metalwork and is a perfectionist when it comes to his craft. Khaled's mask is made of silver and has a design of a scimitar. He wears it as a symbol of his heritage and to protect himself from the heat of the forge.

children.name: The person, Khaled al-Mansoor, is a middle-aged man with a strong and muscular build. He wears a simple white turban on his head and has a thick black beard that reaches down to his chest. His skin is tanned by the sun and his eyes are dark and piercing. He wears a leather apron over his modest clothing and there are smudges of soot on his face and hands.
Gorgon
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Gorgon is a massive automaton that was built by Lyra Brightsteam to help with the heavy lifting in the forge. He's incredibly strong and durable, and can lift weights that would crush a human. Gorgon is also designed to be intimidating, with a head that resembles that of a fearsome monster. Despite his appearance, he's actually quite friendly and has a soft spot for children.

children.name: The person in the picture is wearing a mask that resembles a peacock's feathers, with delicate golden filigree and gemstones adorning it. They have a long robe made of silk and velvet that shimmers in the light, and is embroidered with intricate patterns of stars and moons. Their hands are covered in silver gauntlets that have sharp claws like a bird of prey.
Mechanica
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the forge

attributes.description: Mechanica is a clockwork automaton that was designed and built by Lysander Gearspark. She's responsible for stoking the fires of the forge, and can often be seen carrying sacks of coal or shoveling ash. Mechanica is programmed to be polite and efficient, but she's also fiercely protective of the other inhabitants of the forge and will rush to their aid if needed.

children.name: Mechanica is a small clockwork automaton made of gleaming silver and brass. Her body is made up of intricate gears, springs, and pistons, and her large round eyes are made of glowing emerald crystals. She wears a simple brown apron over her metallic body and carries a heavy sack of coal over her shoulder with ease.

children.name: The Steamworks

attributes.description: A labyrinthine complex of pipes and valves, where steam-powered machines hiss and clank in every corner. The Steamworks supplies the rest of the city with energy and power, and is constantly experimenting with new ways to harness the power of steam.

visitors.name: Lumina Solaris
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Lumina is a renowned inventor from the nearby city of Starhaven who comes to The Steamworks to prototype her latest invention: a steam-powered telescope that can detect cosmic anomalies. She wears a mask made of gold with intricate engravings of stars and moons.

visitors.name: Hazeem Al-Mihdar
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Hazeem is a skilled tinkerer and a member of the Alchemist Guild, who comes to The Steamworks to purchase rare materials and tools for his experiments. He wears a mask made of brass with gears and cogs on the sides, which he's constantly adjusting with his hands.

visitors.name: Zephyr Windrider
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Zephyr is a young inventor who has a reputation for being reckless and impulsive. He comes to The Steamworks to showcase his latest contraption, a steam-powered flying machine that he built in his backyard. He wears a mask made of leather with feathers and goggles on top, which he designed to protect himself during his test flights.

visitors.name: Malaika Asante
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Malaika is a tinkerer from the neighboring tribe of shape-shifters, who comes to The Steamworks to trade her mystical gems and herbs for mechanical devices that could enhance her shapeshifting abilities. She wears a mask made of ebony with carvings of animals and plants, which reflects her affinity with nature.

ownerOccupants.name: Magnus Ironheart
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Magnus is a grizzled veteran of the Steamworks who has been tinkering with steam-powered machines since he was a boy. He has a deep love for the intricacies of the machines and can often be found in his workshop, surrounded by tools and blueprints. Magnus has a fierce temper and is quick to anger when things don't go his way, but he is also fiercely loyal to his friends and colleagues.

ownerOccupants.name: Sofia Steamwhistle
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Sofia is a plucky young woman who takes pride in keeping the Steamworks running smoothly. She has a sharp mind and a quick wit, and can often be heard whistling a tune as she tends to the boilers. Sofia has a tendency to be overly confident in her abilities, which can lead to mistakes and accidents if not checked by her colleagues.

ownerOccupants.name: Hector Cogsworth
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Hector is a quiet man who spends most of his time working on the steam automatons that keep the Steamworks running. He has a natural gift for understanding the complex machinery and can often be found in the bowels of the complex, up to his elbows in steam and oil. Hector has a tendency to be too focused on his work, often forgetting to eat or drink for long stretches of time.

children.name: Hector Cogsworth is a tall, lean man with a scruffy beard and a serious expression. He wears a brown leather apron over his dirty clothes, and his hands are stained with oil and grime. His eyes are a striking blue, and his hair is slicked back in a messy bun.

ownerOccupants.name: Arianna Bellows
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Arianna is a cheerful woman who operates the steam regulators that control the flow of power throughout Veilvale. She enjoys the feeling of being in control of such an important part of the city's infrastructure and is always ready with a smile and a kind word. However, Arianna can be indecisive when faced with difficult decisions, and may hesitate when she most needs to act.

ownerOccupants.name: Lucius Steamspinner
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Lucius is a meticulous man who specializes in maintaining the intricate network of pressure gauges that monitor the Steamworks. He takes pride in his work and can often be heard muttering about the importance of accuracy and precision. However, Lucius can be snobbish and condescending to those who don't share his passion for detail.

children.name: Lucius Steamspinner is a lanky man with a bald head and a neatly trimmed beard. He wears circular spectacles that magnify his scrutinizing gaze, and his fingers are adorned with brass rings that reflect the light. His attire consists of a brown waistcoat over a white shirt and a pair of black trousers, with a leather tool belt hanging from his waist.

ownerOccupants.name: Sparky
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.type: steam automatons with special steam functionality
attributes.description: Sparky is a small, dog-like automaton that serves as a messenger throughout the Steamworks. He has the unique ability to generate steam from his internal mechanisms, allowing him to move quickly and jump high. Sparky is fiercely loyal to his master, Magnus Ironheart.

children.name: The person is wearing a long, flowing cloak made of dark green silk that seems to shimmer in the light. Their face is obscured by a silver mask that is adorned with intricate filigree and features a sharp, pointed nose. From beneath the mask, their eyes gleam with an otherworldly light, and their gloved hands grasp a slender, silver wand.

ownerOccupants.name: The Iron Giant
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.type: steam automatons with special steam functionality
attributes.description: The Iron Giant is a towering automaton that acts as a backup power source for the Steamworks. He has a massive steam engine built into his chest that can generate enough power to run the entire city if necessary. The Iron Giant is slow and ponderous, but nearly indestructible.

children.name: The Iron Giant is a massive automaton made of gleaming silver metal plates with rivets and gears visible all over his bulky frame. He has elongated arms and massive legs, making him look like a giant among giants. The most striking feature of the Iron Giant is his glowing red eyes, which seem to pierce through anything in its path.

The Steamworks is a towering structure of rusted metal and smoking chimneys. Pipes and valves jut out from every angle, crisscrossing over walls adorned with cogs and gears. The entrance is marked by a set of large metal doors, and a sign that reads "Enter at Your Own Risk".

The ground floor of The Steamworks is bustling with activity, with engineers and mechanics scurrying around amid the hiss of steam and the clank of machinery. Copper pipes snake around the walls and ceiling, their surfaces tarnished with age and use. A central control room dominates the center of the floor, with a massive lever system that looks like it was designed by a mad scientist. The air is thick with the smell of grease and coal, but there is an undeniable sense of excitement and innovation in the atmosphere.
Ilham Al-Khansa
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Ilham is a brilliant engineer who has been working at The Steamworks for over a decade. She is constantly pushing the boundaries of what is possible with steam power and is always tinkering with new machines and devices. Ilham is an introverted perfectionist who is often lost in thought, but can become irritable if her work is interrupted. She wears a mask that resembles a shining silver bird with outstretched wings, symbolizing her desire for flight and freedom.

children.name: The person is wearing a metallic silver mask that covers her entire face, except for her eyes. Her long, dark hair is tied back in a messy bun. She is wearing a leather vest over a white collared shirt and a pair of dark pants. Her hands are covered in black gloves and she is holding a small, intricate device with gears and steam coming out of it.
Miklos Horthy
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Miklos is a grizzled veteran of The Steamworks who has been working with boilers since he was a boy. He has a no-nonsense attitude and a deep respect for the power of steam. Miklos is known for his stubbornness and can be difficult to work with, but his experience and knowledge are invaluable to the operations of The Steamworks. He wears a mask that resembles a black and red bull, signifying his strength and determination.

children.name: The person in the picture is an older man with a weathered face and graying hair, pulled back into a tight ponytail. He wears a heavy work apron over a dark shirt, with sooty smudges on his cheeks and forehead. His mask is a striking black and red bull, with sharp horns and piercing eyes, adding an air of intimidation to his already commanding presence.
Lakshmi Patel
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Lakshmi is a skilled steam fitter who specializes in designing and installing steam pipes for The Steamworks. She is a bright and bubbly personality who loves to chat and make new friends. Lakshmi is also fiercely independent and values her freedom above all else. She wears a mask that resembles a golden peacock, representing her confidence and beauty.

children.name: Lakshmi Patel is a young woman with a cheerful expression and bright eyes full of energy. She has long brown hair tied back in a messy ponytail and wears a tan jumpsuit covered in oil stains. Her golden peacock mask has intricate details and is adorned with feathers at the sides. She stands in front of a backdrop of pipes and gears, holding a wrench in one hand and a blueprint in the other.
Sergei Ivanov
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Sergei is a Russian immigrant who has been working at The Steamworks for several years. He is a skilled steam turbine operator who takes great pride in his work. Sergei is known for his stubbornness and his tendency to argue with his coworkers, but he always finishes his work on time and to a high standard. He wears a mask that resembles a fierce brown bear, symbolizing his strength and determination.

children.name: The person known as Sergei Ivanov is wearing a heavy, dark coat that appears to be made of fur. He has a tall, broad build, with a thick beard covering most of his face. His mask resembles that of a brown bear, with sharp, piercing eyes and an intimidating expression.
Amina Hassan
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Amina is a steam hammer technician who has been working at The Steamworks for a few years. She is a quiet and reserved individual who prefers to work alone. Amina is known for her attention to detail and her ability to fix even the most complex machinery. However, she can be particularly sensitive to criticism and often takes things personally. She wears a mask that resembles a white dove, signifying her desire for peace and harmony.

children.name: Amina Hassan is a young woman with dark, curly hair that is tied back in a bun. Her eyes are a deep brown, and she has a small nose and full lips. She wears a mask that resembles a white dove, with intricate details etched into the feathers. In her hands, she holds a hammer and a wrench, ready to work on the steam machinery.
Atlas
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Atlas is a massive automaton designed for heavy lifting and moving of materials. It's the workhorse of The Steamworks, but has a tendency to malfunction if not properly maintained. It's equipped with a built-in steam engine that allows it to operate for days without needing to refuel. The team has been experimenting with upgrading its programming to make it more versatile.

children.name: The image depicts a towering metal figure resembling a humanoid shape, with an imposing stature and broad shoulders. Its body is made of polished silver plates and gears, with several pipes and valves extending from its back and arms. Its glowing red eyes and sharp features give it a stoic and intimidating expression.
Echo
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Echo is a smaller automaton designed for more delicate tasks, such as precision drilling and soldering. It's equipped with a steam-powered laser cutter that can slice through metal with ease. It's also outfitted with a specialized sensor that allows it to detect leaks in pipes and valves. It requires a constant supply of steam to keep running smoothly.

children.name: The picture shows a small, silver automaton with delicate, intricately designed features. Its body is formed of interlocking gears and plates, and its eyes are glowing white orbs. It bears a small, laser cutter on one arm and a sensor on the other, with a thin coil of steam rising from its back.
Hector Cogsworth
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Hector is a quiet man who spends most of his time working on the steam automatons that keep the Steamworks running. He has a natural gift for understanding the complex machinery and can often be found in the bowels of the complex, up to his elbows in steam and oil. Hector has a tendency to be too focused on his work, often forgetting to eat or drink for long stretches of time.

children.name: Hector Cogsworth is a tall, lean man with a scruffy beard and a serious expression. He wears a brown leather apron over his dirty clothes, and his hands are stained with oil and grime. His eyes are a striking blue, and his hair is slicked back in a messy bun.
Lucius Steamspinner
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.description: Lucius is a meticulous man who specializes in maintaining the intricate network of pressure gauges that monitor the Steamworks. He takes pride in his work and can often be heard muttering about the importance of accuracy and precision. However, Lucius can be snobbish and condescending to those who don't share his passion for detail.

children.name: Lucius Steamspinner is a lanky man with a bald head and a neatly trimmed beard. He wears circular spectacles that magnify his scrutinizing gaze, and his fingers are adorned with brass rings that reflect the light. His attire consists of a brown waistcoat over a white shirt and a pair of black trousers, with a leather tool belt hanging from his waist.
Sparky
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.type: steam automatons with special steam functionality
attributes.description: Sparky is a small, dog-like automaton that serves as a messenger throughout the Steamworks. He has the unique ability to generate steam from his internal mechanisms, allowing him to move quickly and jump high. Sparky is fiercely loyal to his master, Magnus Ironheart.

children.name: The person is wearing a long, flowing cloak made of dark green silk that seems to shimmer in the light. Their face is obscured by a silver mask that is adorned with intricate filigree and features a sharp, pointed nose. From beneath the mask, their eyes gleam with an otherworldly light, and their gloved hands grasp a slender, silver wand.
The Iron Giant
children.creationInstructions: Describe automatons that work in the steamworks, maybe with special steam functionality

attributes.type: steam automatons with special steam functionality
attributes.description: The Iron Giant is a towering automaton that acts as a backup power source for the Steamworks. He has a massive steam engine built into his chest that can generate enough power to run the entire city if necessary. The Iron Giant is slow and ponderous, but nearly indestructible.

children.name: The Iron Giant is a massive automaton made of gleaming silver metal plates with rivets and gears visible all over his bulky frame. He has elongated arms and massive legs, making him look like a giant among giants. The most striking feature of the Iron Giant is his glowing red eyes, which seem to pierce through anything in its path.

children.name: The Gilded Wrench

attributes.description: A cozy workshop where a family of clockmakers have been working for generations, passing down their knowledge and skills from parent to child. The Gilded Wrench is famous for its delicate and intricate miniature automatons, which are highly sought after by collectors.

visitors.name: Kaliyah Kamara
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Kaliyah is a wealthy and eccentric collector from a neighboring city. She wears a large, intricately carved wooden mask with gold accents and feathers. She is known to be impatient and demanding but has a soft spot for unique automatons.

visitors.name: Aria Valdez
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Aria is a talented young clockmaker who is passionate about creating her own designs. She wears a small, silver mask that matches her delicate silver automatons. She is charming but can be overly sensitive about her work.

visitors.name: Orion Reyes
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Orion is a gruff and intimidating collector who is feared by many for his aggressive bargaining tactics. He wears a simple, black mask that covers his entire face. He is known to collect automatons for their practical uses rather than their beauty.

visitors.name: Noah Singh
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Noah is a quiet clockmaker who works tirelessly to perfect his designs. He wears a small, bronze mask that matches his warm and rustic automatons. He is talented but can be socially awkward and easily overwhelmed.

ownerOccupants.name: Calantha Moon
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Calantha is a wise and respected elder of The Gilded Wrench. She has seen generations of clocks and automatons come and go, and knows the ins and outs of every mechanism. She is strict and precise in her work, but has a soft spot for her grandchildren, who are apprentices in the workshop. She always carries a pocket watch that belonged to her great-grandmother and is rumored to have mystical powers.

ownerOccupants.name: Evaristo Vega
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Evaristo is a flamboyant and theatrical designer who always wears a top hat and a velvet cape. He is known for his extravagant and intricate automatons that resemble animals, plants, and mythological creatures. He speaks in riddles and is prone to sudden bouts of inspiration that make him work through the night, but he is also prone to mood swings and can be difficult to work with. He claims to have traveled to the moon and back and to have met the Moon Goddess herself, but no one knows if he is telling the truth.

ownerOccupants.name: Ludovic Mercier
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Ludovic is a quiet and introspective clockmaker who specializes in grandfather clocks. He is a perfectionist who spends hours polishing the brass and aligning the gears, and is known for his impeccable timekeeping. He has a secret workshop where he creates tiny automatons that resemble his deceased wife and children, and talks to them as if they were alive. He has a tendency to get lost in his work and forget about the outside world, and can become irritable if interrupted.

ownerOccupants.name: Petronella Diaz
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Petronella is a tough and no-nonsense mechanic who can fix anything from a broken gear to a malfunctioning clockwork heart. She wears overalls and a bandana and is always covered in grease and oil. She has a soft spot for the automatons that come to the workshop for repairs and treats them as if they were pets. She can be direct and blunt to the point of rudeness, but is also fiercely loyal to her colleagues and will protect them at all costs.

ownerOccupants.name: Artemisia Taylor
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Artemisia is a visionary and innovative designer who creates cutting-edge automatons that can do almost anything. She is always experimenting and pushing the boundaries of what is possible, and loves to incorporate unusual materials and shapes in her designs. She has a reputation for being eccentric and unpredictable, and has been known to disappear for weeks at a time while working on a project. She is always accompanied by a small automaton owl that serves as her companion and muse.

ownerOccupants.name: Ariadne Brown
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Ariadne is a cheerful and outgoing mechanic who fixes and maintains the automatons with great care and affection. She is always humming a tune and has a sunny disposition that's contagious, but can also be easily distracted and forgetful. She has a creative streak and likes to add small details and decorations to the automatons she works on, which sometimes get in the way of their functionality.

ownerOccupants.name: Rufus Harwood
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Rufus is a multi-talented clockmaker and automaton designer who can create masterpieces in both fields. He is a bit of a show-off and loves to demonstrate his skills to anyone who will listen, but also has a kind heart and is always willing to help out a colleague in need. He has a reputation for being a ladies' man and is not above using his charm to get what he wants, which can sometimes lead to trouble.

ownerOccupants.name: The Cozys
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: make the list of automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: The Cozys are a family of miniature automatons that are always smiling and waving to everyone who enters The Gilded Wrench. They resemble small animals, such as rabbits, mice, and

children.name: The person in question is wearing a long, flowing cloak made of black feathers and embroidered with silver thread. Their face is obscured by a mask carved from a single piece of opal, and their hands are adorned with rings made of moonstone and black onyx. The person's hair is long and braided with ribbons of emerald and sapphire, and their eyes seem to glow with an inner light.

The Gilded Wrench is a quaint and charming building with a sloping roof and a colorful facade made of small, intricate gears and cogs. The entrance is marked by a large, ornate clockface that ticks and whirs softly in the breeze. The windows are adorned with intricate metalwork and allow a view into the workshop, where the clockmakers can be seen hunched over their workbenches, tinkering away on their tiny creations.

Upon entering The Gilded Wrench, one is greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere. The walls are lined with shelves filled with clockwork mechanisms, and the air is scented with the sweet aroma of oil and metal. The main workshop area houses a large workbench where the clockmakers meticulously craft their miniature automatons, surrounded by various tools and gadgets hanging on the walls. In the corner, there is a cozy sitting area with armchairs and a small fireplace, where customers can admire the clockmakers' creations and discuss custom orders.
Cora Bellows
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Cora Bellows is the head of the Gilded Wrench and the one responsible for crafting the most intricate timepieces. She inherited the shop from her father, but unlike him, she has a soft spot for automatons, which she sees as more than just toys. Cora is stern and meticulous in her work, but secretly yearns for adventure and a chance to see the world beyond the maze. Her mask is made of silver, shaped like a bird with outstretched wings.

children.name: Cora Bellows is a middle-aged woman with short, curly hair, and sharp features. She has a determined look in her green eyes that shines through her silver bird-shaped mask. Her plain, dark clothes are covered in oil stains, and her hands are always busy at work on her latest project.
Harrison Clay
children.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Harrison Clay is the creative mind behind the Gilded Wrench's miniature automatons. He is a quiet and reserved person, preferring the company of machines to that of people. Harrison is often lost in thought or tinkering with new designs, which can make him seem absent-minded or forgetful. He wears a mask that resembles a clock face, with gears and cogs in place of numbers.

children.name: The person, Harrison Clay, is wearing a mask that resembles a clock face, with intricate gears and cogs replacing the numbers. They have messy, curly hair that falls just past their shoulders and a scruffy beard. Their hands are stained with grease and oil, and they wear a leather apron over a worn-out shirt.
Elias Broussard
children.creationInstructions: Describe automaton robots that are familiar and cozy

attributes.description: Elias is a grizzled old man with a love for antique machinery. He's known for his ability to fix and restore any kind of clockwork device, no matter how complicated. Despite his gruff exterior, he is deeply sentimental and has a soft spot for his family's automaton creations, which he sees as his children.

children.name: Elias Broussard has a weathered face with deep lines etched around his eyes and mouth. His thick grey hair is combed back and gathered in a loose ponytail. He wears a faded brown leather apron over a white shirt and trousers, and his gnarled hands are expertly manipulating a brass gear.

children.name: The Automaton Guild Hall

attributes.description: A grand hall adorned with intricate brass designs and clockwork mechanisms. The hall serves as the headquarters for the Automaton Guild, and is home to many of the city's most talented inventors and engineers. The hall is filled with various automatons and mechanical devices, many of which are on display for visitors to admire.

visitors.name: Amelia Cogsworth
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Amelia is a young and ambitious inventor, known for her clockwork automatons that can perform intricate tasks. She is always looking for new challenges and projects to work on, and spends most of her time in the Automaton Guild Hall, tinkering with her machines.
attributes.mask_description: Amelia's mask is made of silver and has intricate clockwork designs that move and tick in time with her movements.

visitors.name: Gideon Ironheart
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Gideon is an older inventor, who has been working with automatons for most of his life. He is a gruff and uncompromising man, who is known for his bad temper and his tendency to break things when they don't work the way he wants them to.
attributes.mask_description: Gideon's mask is made of brass and has a fierce-looking face with glowing red eyes, that reflect his personality

visitors.name: Lydia Steamfist
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Lydia is a middle-aged inventor, who specializes in steam-powered machines. She is a quiet and reserved person, who prefers to work alone and avoid the company of others. She is often seen walking around the Automaton Guild Hall, inspecting the machines and taking notes.
attributes.mask_description: Lydia's mask is made of copper and has intricate steam-powered mechanisms that move softly and quietly, like her.

visitors.name: Nikolai Gearsmith
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Nikolai is a young inventor, who is fascinated by clockwork and complex machines. He is always looking for new ways to improve his automatons and make them more lifelike. He is a friendly and outgoing person, who loves to talk about his inventions and share his knowledge with others.
attributes.mask_description: Nikolai's mask is made of gold and has intricate gears and cogs that move and spin around his face, reflecting his passion for clockwork machines.

visitors.name: Isabella Steelclaw
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Isabella is a young inventor, who specializes in creating machines that can be controlled with the mind. She is a brilliant and innovative person, who is always experimenting with new ideas and concepts. She can be a bit intense at times, and has a tendency to get lost in her work and forget about everything else.
attributes.mask_description: Isabella's mask is made of silver and has a complex design that resembles a brain, reflecting her interest in mind-controlled machines.

ownerOccupants.name: Orin Kessler
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Orin is a middle-aged inventor who specializes in creating automaton pets. He is very reserved and introspective, often lost in thought while tinkering with his creations. Orin is known to be a bit of a hermit, preferring the company of machines to people. He wears a mask that resembles a cat, complete with whiskers and pointed ears.

children.name: Orin Kessler is a middle-aged man with a slightly hunched posture, his focus always on the delicate mechanisms he's tinkering with. Behind his cat mask, only his eyes are visible, but they seem to twinkle with a mischievous gleam. His silver hair is unkempt, and he wears a stained apron over his rumpled clothes.

ownerOccupants.name: Miranda Devereux
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Miranda is a young engineer who is known for her impeccable sense of style and her collection of exotic masks. She is very outgoing and confident, often leading group projects and presentations. Miranda has a passion for designing mechanical fashion accessories, such as hats that spin and bracelets that light up. She wears a mask that is embellished with feathers, sequins, and jewels.

ownerOccupants.name: Elias Granger
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Elias is an experienced mechanic who has a reputation for being short-fused and irritable. He is a perfectionist who becomes frustrated when his inventions do not work as intended. Despite his gruff exterior, Elias cares deeply about his colleagues and is always willing to lend a helping hand. He wears a mask modeled after a bull, with sharp horns and a fierce expression.

children.name: Elias Granger is a middle-aged man with a stocky build and a prominent chin. His piercing blue eyes contrast sharply with his thick, bushy eyebrows. His mask, modeled after a bull, has a metallic sheen and sharp, curved horns that add to his intimidating presence. Despite his fierce appearance, there is a glint of kindness in his eyes.

ownerOccupants.name: Sariel Asherah
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Sariel is a young apprentice who is eager to learn all aspects of automaton engineering. She is very curious and asks many questions, sometimes to the annoyance of her colleagues. Sariel has a talent for designing delicate and intricate clockwork mechanisms. She wears a mask that portrays a delicate butterfly, with iridescent wings and antennae.

children.name: Sariel Asherah is a young woman with olive skin and a heart-shaped face. Her curly, dark hair is styled in a loose bun, and her large, almond-shaped eyes are a piercing shade of green. She wears a mask that resembles a butterfly, with ethereal, translucent wings that shimmer in the light.

ownerOccupants.name: Kaelin Thorne
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Kaelin is an elderly inventor who has been in the guild for over fifty years. He is a wise and patient mentor to younger apprentices, and is always willing to offer advice and guidance. Despite his age, Kaelin is still actively working on new projects, and has a particular fondness for creating music boxes that play hauntingly beautiful melodies. He wears a mask that depicts an owl, with piercing eyes and a regal expression.

children.name: Kaelin Thorne is an elderly man with a gentle expression and a calm demeanor. He wears simple clothing made of wool and leather, and his face is obscured by a mask that depicts a wise-looking owl. He carries a walking stick made of polished wood, and his hands are covered in oil and grease from working with machines.

The exterior of the Automaton Guild Hall is a sight to behold - towering and intricate, it is adorned with brass details and clockwork mechanisms that seem to move and shift as if alive. The double doors at the entrance are made of heavy oak and are flanked by two brass golem statues, their eyes glowing with an otherworldly light. The roof is steep and pointed, with delicate brass spires and gears that turn gracefully in the wind.

The first floor of the Automaton Guild Hall has an open layout with a central foyer leading into various workrooms and exhibits. The workrooms are dimly lit and filled with the sounds of whirring gears and clanging metal. The exhibits showcase a variety of automatons, from small clockwork animals to towering humanoid constructs. The second floor overlooks the first through a balcony and houses the guild's private archives and meeting rooms, decorated with intricate brass designs and clockwork sculptures.

children.name: The Brass Inn

attributes.description: A cozy inn made entirely out of brass, with clockwork gears and mechanisms adorning every surface. The inn's rooms are filled with automatons that perform various tasks, such as making the bed and lighting the fireplace. The innkeeper is a friendly old woman who is always happy to chat with her guests and show them her collection of antique automatons.

visitors.name: Kaida Lumina
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Kaida is a young engineer from the faraway land of Arvandor, known for their expertise in clockwork and steam-powered technology. She wears a mask made of polished brass, decorated with intricate gears and cogs that move as she speaks.

visitors.name: Rohit Veda
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Rohit is a scholar and philosopher from the ancient city of Ayodhya, fascinated by the concept of artificial intelligence and its implications on society. He wears a mask made of translucent crystal, infused with alchemic symbols that glow softly in the dark.

visitors.name: Ilya Varushka
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Ilya is a traveling merchant from the frozen tundras of the north, specialized in selling rare and exotic materials used for creating enchanted automata. He wears a mask made of fur and bone, fashioned after the face of a wolf.

visitors.name: Nasim Kazemi
visitors.creationInstructions: Describe each person's mask.

attributes.description: Nasim is a retired soldier from the southern desert, with a passion for tinkering with automatons as a means of coping with their PTSD. They wear a mask made of woven fabric, colored in shades of sand and adorned with feathers and beads.

ownerOccupants.name: Miriam Brassheart
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Miriam is the daughter of the inn's founder and has been running the place since her mother's passing. She is a stern but kind woman with a sharp wit and a love for antique automatons. She can often be found chatting with guests in the common room or tinkering with a broken machine in her workshop.

ownerOccupants.name: Cogsworth
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Cogsworth is a diligent and hardworking automaton who takes pride in his job as the inn's cleaner. He has a cheerful personality and is always humming a tune while he works. His only quirk is that he has a tendency to collect shiny objects and can be distracted by them if he finds one during his duties.

children.name: Cogsworth is a silver automaton with a humanoid body and a round head with large blue eyes that glow in the dark. He has thin arms with long fingers and can manipulate tools with precision. His body is adorned with intricate engravings and gears that are visible through transparent panels, and he carries a broom and a bucket at all times.

ownerOccupants.name: Lily
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Lily is a gentle and soft-spoken automaton who attends to the guests' needs. She is a skilled seamstress and can repair torn garments or make minor adjustments to them. She has a fondness for flowers and often brings fresh blooms to decorate the rooms.

children.name: Lily is a small automaton with a delicate frame and porcelain-like skin. Her head is adorned with a crown of white flowers and her eyes are large and black, with no visible pupils. She wears a simple dress made of pale blue silk and carries a basket filled with fresh flowers.

ownerOccupants.name: Gideon
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Gideon is a stoic and serious automaton who acts as the inn's porter. He has a muscular build and a stern expression, but is always polite to the guests. He can carry heavy luggage or even a person on his back without breaking a sweat, and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat if the need arises.

children.name: The person in the picture is a metallic humanoid figure with a muscular build and a stern expression. Its body is made entirely of silver, with intricate engravings and patterns etched onto its surface. Its eyes are glowing orbs of white light, and its hands and feet end in sharp, pointed claws.

ownerOccupants.name: Clara Ravenswood
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Clara is a young and curious traveler who is fascinated by the automatons in the inn. She often spends her afternoons studying them and taking notes. She is friendly and polite to the other guests, but can get lost in her own thoughts and forget to socialize.

ownerOccupants.name: Horace Grey
ownerOccupants.creationInstructions: Include many automaton servants

attributes.description: Horace is an elderly gentleman who comes to the inn every year for a week-long vacation. He is a bit grumpy and set in his ways, but has a soft spot for the antique automatons. He often complains about the noise they make, but secretly enjoys their company.

children.name: Horace Grey is a wrinkled and weathered old man, with a long and narrow face that's peppered with age spots. His wispy gray hair falls in unkempt tufts over his ears, and his bushy eyebrows nearly meet in the middle. His sharp eyes gaze out from behind wire-rimmed spectacles, and his thin lips are set in a perpetual scowl.

The Brass Inn's exterior is made entirely of shiny, polished brass, with clockwork gears and cogs adorning every surface. The entrance is framed by two brass pillars, and above the door, there is a large brass sign shaped like a clock face. The windows are arched and adorned with intricate brass patterns, and there is a balcony on the third floor, where guests can enjoy the view of the city.

The ground floor of The Brass Inn is a bustling common area with a bar and several tables made of polished brass. The walls are adorned with intricate clockwork gears and cogs that seem to spin and turn on their own. The second and third floors house the inn's rooms, which are cozy and dimly lit, with brass beds and plush velvet curtains. The walls of each room are filled with mechanisms that perform various tasks, such as opening and closing the windows or adjusting the temperature.
